name: py-env-studio
summary: A comprehensive cross-platform GUI and CLI tool for managing Python virtual environments and packages with advanced features including environment lifecycle management, package operations, vulnerability scanning, security insights, Py-Tonic interactive learning mode, and an extensible plugin system for custom functionality.
